innerAbility.name: 2nd/3rd Line Options
abilities: Chance to Skip Cooldown +10% (if not 1st line)

attackStats.name: LUK

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/lune.png} tip={Lune (3rd Job)} val={+40}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/cane-expert.png} tip={Cane Expert (4th Job)} val={+40}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/freuds-wisdom.png} tip={Freud's Wisdom (5th Job)} val={+25}>

attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/piercing-vision.png} tip={Piercing Vision (3rd Job)} val={+35%}> <bg src={/class-icons/link-skills/phantom-instinct.png} tip={Phantom Instinct (Link Skill)} val={Lv. 2: +15%} val={Lv. 3: +20%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/judgment-draw.png} tip={Judgment Draw - Destin (Beginner Skill)} val={+20%}>

build: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/feather-foot.png} tip={Feather Foot}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/phantom-swiftness.png} tip={Phantom Swiftness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-i.png} tip={Impeccable Memory I}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/double-entendre.png} tip={Double Entendre}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/devils-luck.png} tip={Devil's Luck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/cane-mastery.png} tip={Cane Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/cane-acceleration.png} tip={Cane Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/carte-blanche.png} tip={Carte Blanche}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-ii.png} tip={Impeccable Memory II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/calling-card.png} tip={Calling Card}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mille-cartes.png} tip={Mille Cartes}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/piercing-vision.png} tip={Piercing Vision}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mist-mask.png} tip={Mist Mask}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/bad-luck-ward.png} tip={Bad Luck Ward}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/final-feint.png} tip={Final Feint}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/lune.png} tip={Lune}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-iii.png} tip={Impeccable Memory III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/blason.png} tip={Blason}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/rapier-wit.png} tip={Rapier Wit}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/carte-noir.png} tip={Carte Noir}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/cane-expert.png} tip={Cane Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/priere-daria.png} tip={Priere D'Aria}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-iv.png} tip={Impeccable Memory IV}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/vol-dame.png} tip={Vol D'Ame}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/penombre.png} tip={Penombre}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mille-aiguilles.png} tip={Mille Aiguilles}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/tempest.png} tip={Tempest}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/tempest-reinforce.png} tip={Tempest - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/tempest-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Tempest - Cooldown Cutter}> Tempest - Reinforce and Cooldown Cutter_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mille-aiguilles-reinforce.png} tip={Mille Aiguilles - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mille-aiguilles-guardbreak.png} tip={Mille Aiguilles - Guardbreak}> Mille Aiguilles - Reinforce and Guardbreak_>[Choice of]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-reinforce.png} tip={Impeccable Memory - Reinforce}> Impeccable Memory - Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-persist.png} tip={Impeccable Memory - Persist}> Impeccable Memory - Persist_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-enhance.png} tip={Impeccable Memory - Enhance}> Impeccable Memory - Enhance_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mille-aiguilles.png} tip={Mille Aiguilles (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/tempest.png} tip={Tempest (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/carte-noir.png} tip={Carte Blanche and Carte Noir (2nd Job / 4th Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-iii.png} tip={Impeccable Memory III (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-iv.png} tip={Impeccable Memory IV (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/rose-carte-finale.png} tip={Rose Carte Finale (Hyper Skill)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/double-entendre.png} tip={Double Entendre (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/calling-card.png} tip={Calling Card (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mille-cartes.png} tip={Mille Cartes (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/carte-noir.png} tip={Carte Blanche and Carte Noir (2nd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/blason.png} tip={Blason (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/rapier-wit.png} tip={Rapier Wit (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mille-aiguilles.png} tip={Mille Aiguilles (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/penombre.png} tip={Penombre (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/tempest.png} tip={Tempest (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/rose-carte-finale.png} tip={Rose Carte Finale (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-i.png} tip={Impeccable Memory I (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-ii.png} tip={Impeccable Memory II (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-iii.png} tip={Impeccable Memory III (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/impeccable-memory-iv.png} tip={Impeccable Memory IV (4th Job)}>

credits: Hyper Passive Build + Inner Ability + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Card Gauge & Explorer Skill Stealing
content: In 2nd Job, the Card Gauge is unlocked where each time a Card is created from Carte Blanche, the number of Cards held in the gauge is increased. Upon reaching max capacity, Judgment Draw (Beginner) can be used to unleash a barrage of Cards and gain a buff. This attack can be modified in the Beginner Skills to activate manually or automatically
In 4th Job, the Cards are enhanced by <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/carte-noir.png} tip={Carte Noir (4th Job)}> Carte Noir and the Card Gauge capacity is increased
Phantoms can steal the skills of Explorer classes to copy and use them. Certain skills cannot be stolen and the passive effects of skills do not apply

To steal skills, use the <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/skill-swipe.png} tip={Swipe (Beginner Skill)}> Swipe skill in the beginners tab and search for Explorer characters to steal from. To manage your stolen skills, open up the Skill Management UI by using the <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/loadout.png} tip={Loadout (Beginner Skill)}> Loadout skill in your beginners tab

primary.name: To The Skies
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Returns you to Lumiere

primary.name: Shroud Walk
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Use directional keys to teleport\n(Arrows shown only for the directions you can go)\nNumber of directional keys you can enter: 3, Each movement you make after the skill ends increases the cooldown by 1.5 seconds.
primary.desc: Allows you to teleport using the directional keys up to 3 times
details: Cooldown increases based on the number of times teleported (1.5 secs each)

primary.name: Dexterous Training
primary.shortDesc: DEX: +40, Avoidability: +20%, Diligence: Lv. 20, Insight: Lv. 20

primary.name: Skill Swipe
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Shifts to steal mode upon use\nMove the mouse cursor to select the nearby Explorer character
primary.desc: Activates a special mode for selecting and stealing skills from nearby Explorer characters
details: Passive effects of stolen skills will not be applied
Skill duration and cooldowns are the same for Phantom<bp_Certain skills may not be stolen and Bishop's <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/heal.png} tip={Heal (2nd Job)}> cooldown will be longer_>

primary.name: Loadout
primary.shortDesc: Manage stolen skills. 30 second cooldown added.
primary.desc: Opens UI to manage all stolen skills
details: After equipping a stolen skill, there is a cooldown (30 secs) before it can be used

primary.name: Judgment Draw
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, Attacks enemies with Carte Noir 10 times. Also grants one of the following effects for 30 sec.
Destin Card: Critical Rate +20%
Malheur Card: Item Drop Rate +10%
Endurance Card: Abnormal Status Resistance +20, Elemental Resistance +20
Drain Card: 1% of Max HP recovered when attacking
primary.desc: Releases all cards stored in the Card Gauge that seek out and attack one enemy
details: Phantom has a special gauge that is charged by attacking enemies<bp_Once it is full using this skill resets the gauge_>

Upon activating, gain one of the following buffs:<bp_[Destin]: Increases %Crit Rate_[Malheur]: Increases %Item Drop Rate_[Endurance]: Increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance_[Drain]: Restore some %Max HP when attacking_>

primary.name: Judgment Draw Auto/Manual
primary.shortDesc: Auto Mode: Automatically activates the Judgment Draw skill when your deck is full.\nManual Mode: Judgment Draw must be used manually, even if your deck is empty.
primary.desc: When this skill is on Auto, <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/judgment-draw.png} tip={Judgment Draw (Beginner Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/judgment-draw-2.png} tip={Judgment Draw (Beginner Skill)}> will automatically be used when your Card Gauge is filled

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/9/The_Truth_About_Skaia} title={"The Truth About Skaia"}>

primary.name: Double Entendre
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 178%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Strike forward twice

primary.name: Impeccable Memory I
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: MP to use the equipped skill.\nSkill Level of the stolen skill cannot be over 20
primary.desc: Allows you to use a stolen 1st Job Explorer skill

primary.name: Phantom Swiftness
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Additional Jump distance\n[Passive Effects - Movement Speed +35, Max Movement Speed +20, Jump +20]
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>
Horizontal jump can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Feather Foot
primary.shortDesc: Avoidability +20%

primary.name: Calling Card
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Sends out cards that strike forward

primary.name: Impeccable Memory II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: MP to use the equipped skill.\nSkill Level of the stolen skill cannot be over 20
primary.desc: Allows you to use a stolen 2nd Job Explorer skill

primary.name: Mille Cartes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 320%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Knocks back enemies
primary.desc: Launches a blast of cards that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Carte Blanche
primary.shortDesc: Upon a successful critical attack, card appears at 60% chance, Damage: 160%, Deck +1
primary.desc: Upon landing a critical hit, there is a chance to create a card that seek and attack a nearby enemy

primary.name: Cane Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Cane Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Cane Acceleration
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed +2, Luck: +20
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages) and grants flat LUK

primary.name: Devil's Luck
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 60

primary.name: Blason
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Slices up enemies in front of you

primary.name: Impeccable Memory III
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: MP to use the equipped skill.\nSkill Level of the stolen skill cannot be over 20
primary.desc: Allows you to use a stolen 3rd Job Explorer skill

primary.name: Final Feint
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, upon death, you revive with 100% of Max HP. Makes you invincible for 4 sec\nAfter using buff: Cooldown: 1800 sec\n[Passive Effects: Permanently increases LUK by 60]
primary.desc: When hit by a fatal attack, you will not die but instead heal back a percentage of your HP back
details: You are briefly invincible after reviving

primary.name: Bad Luck Ward
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +30%, Max MP: +30%, Elemental Resistance: +45%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +45, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Lune
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power +40

primary.name: Mist Mask
primary.shortDesc: Additional Avoidability Chance: 30%
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks

primary.name: Rapier Wit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, While moving - Damage: 270%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 2, After moving - Attacks 3 times with 270% damage\n[Passive Effects - Carte Mille Damage: +50%]
primary.desc: Dashes forward and then strikes forward
details: Can be linked with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mille-cartes.png} tip={Mille Cartes (2nd Job)}> to reduce post-attack delay

primary.name: Piercing Vision
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Critical Rate by 35% and Final Damage by 30%.

primary.name: Mille Aiguilles
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 15, Damage: 160%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Hits: 3\nWhile pressing the skill key, use the directional keys to move.
primary.desc: While held, strike forward with a flurry of attacks

primary.name: Impeccable Memory IV
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: MP to use the equipped skill.\nSkill Level of the stolen skill cannot be over 30
primary.desc: Allows you to use a stolen 4th Job Explorer skill

primary.name: Tempest
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 20, Can hold key down for up to 5 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 455%, Number of Attacks: 3\nEnemy DEF Ignored: 20% for 60\nCooldown: 18 sec
primary.desc: While held, release a storm of cards that damages enemies within and applies a debuff
details: All attacks from Tempest are critical hits

primary.name: Penombre
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Damage: 450%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 3\n[Passive Effects - Rapier Wit Damage: +50%]
primary.desc: Leap backwards while throwing cards that explode
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/rapier-wit.png} tip={Rapier Wit (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Carte Noir
primary.shortDesc:
Upon a successful critical attack, a card has a 100% chance to appear. Damage: 270%, Deck +1
Swerve Card: attacks up to 4 enemies for 900% of damage. Cooldown increases by 5 sec.
Bonus Avoidability: 20%.
Damage Against Normal Monsters: +150%
details: Increases %Damage and chance to create cards on successful critical hits
Now grants a new attack when you attack that periodically creates a card that targets nearby enemies previously were not targeted by the skill
Attack now deal increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Priere D'Aria
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Aria's image appears.\n[Passive Effects - Damage: +45%, Ignore Defense: 30%, Knockback Resistance: +60%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Cane Expert
primary.shortDesc: Cane Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +40, Critical Damage: +15%, Final Damage: +32%
details: Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage and %Final Damage

primary.name: Vol D'Ame
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies: 12, Buffs applied:
Attack: Attack +40
Damage Ignored: Damage Received -40%
Damage Reflect: Reflects 600% of Damage Received
Cancels Physical/Magic Attacks, Obsidian Skin: Temporary Invincibility except against some attacks
Cooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: Steals the buffs of nearby enemies, if more than one is stolen, the most powerful is applied
details: If the buff stolen was:<bp_[Attack Increasing]: Gain flat Attack_[Damage Ignoring]: Gain increased %Damage Reduction_[Damage Reflecting]: Reflect back a portion of damage received_[Invincibility]: Become temporarily invincible_>

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

hyperPassive.name: Impeccable Memory - Persist
hyperPassive.desc: Increases %Buff Duration of stolen explorer skills

hyperPassive.name: Impeccable Memory - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Loadout's number of stolen 4th skill slots increases by 1.

hyperActive.name: Impeccable Memory H
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: the stolen skill's MP cost
hyperActive.desc: Allows you to use a stolen Explorer Hyper Skill

hyperActive.name: Rose Carte Finale
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 6, Deals 200% damage to 6 enemies near the card 2 times.\nCooldown: 30 sec
hyperActive.desc: Cards rain from above leaving a damaging field of cards

hyperActive.name: Heroic Memories
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Hero class in the party

fifthMain.name: Luck of the Draw
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Can hold the key down for up to 5 sec. Attack by periodically throwing multiple cards forward. Damage: 820%, Number of Attacks: 1, Damage Taken during skill: -15%.
When finished, draws a card to buff all party members for 30 sec.
Priest - Recovers 2% Max HP/MP over time.
Tree of Life - All Damage Taken: -8%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +25
Hourglass - Active Cooldowns shortened by 32% (except skills that ignore cooldown resets).
Three Swords - Final Damage +6%.
Luck of the Draw - Gain all card buffs simultaneously.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, throw a flurry of cards towards a single enemy
details: While casting, damage taken is reduced (including %Max HP attacks) and you are immune to stun status effects
Prioritizes bosses with the highest Max HP first

At the end of the skill, you will draw a card that buffs all party members:<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/luck-of-the-draw-red.png} tip={Luck of the Draw - Priest (5th Job)}> [Priest]: Recovers %HP/MP over time_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/luck-of-the-draw-green.png} tip={Luck of the Draw - Tree of Life (5th Job)}> [Tree of Life]: Increases %Damage Reduction (including %Max HP attacks) and Abnormal Status Resistance_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/luck-of-the-draw-yellow.png} tip={Luck of the Draw - Hourglass (5th Job)}> [Hourglass]: Reduces active cooldowns by 20% (except 5th Job skills & skills that ignore cooldown resets)_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/luck-of-the-draw-blue.png} tip={Luck of the Draw - Sharp Sword (5th Job)}> [Three Swords]: Increases %Final Damage_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/luck-of-the-draw-black.png} tip={Luck of the Draw (5th Job)}> [Luck of the Draw]: Gain all buffs simultaneously_You are invincible while drawing the card_>

fifthMain.name: Ace in the Hole
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 800, 3 of cards ricochet 6 times, dealing 1430% damage, before releasing the energy stored inside to strike up to 12 enemies for 1925% damage 6 times.\nLiberated Card: activates its offensive power 3 time(s). Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1540%, Number of Attacks: 1. Attacks are activated up to 21 time(s) in proportion to the number the ricocheted cards' remaining attacks.\nCooldown: 15 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Throw several cards that bounces around before unleashing a final attack
details: Pressing the Down Arrow Key and the Skill Key together will instead activate a special final attack in a large area<bp_The number of attacks increase based on how many bounces remain for the cards_>
Pressing the Skill Key while the skill is active will cause the cards to gather towards the enemy with the highest Max HP and deal the final attack
If there are no enemies nearby, the final attack will activate instantly when the attack ends

fifthMain.name: Phantom's Mark
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000. Requires 7 Master Thief Marks, if there is no enemy already marked as a target. Uses all Master Thief Marks upon skill activation.
Invincible for 2 sec after moving.
Activates a trajectory 7 time(s) dealing 660% damage 6 time(s) and complete the Master Thief Mark, activating 2 times and dealing 1055% damage 15 time(s). For all attacks, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Additional Critical Rate: +100%
Enemies hit with a Cane skill or Tempest get a debuff for 30 sec. Targets the enemy with 7 stacks.
Mille Aiguilles, Tempest, and Rift Break must hit targets 7 times more than other skills to mark an enemy or earn Master Thief Marks.
Attack skills that utilize Impeccable Memory must hit 5 times.
 Cooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Cane skill attacks mark enemies with "Phantom Thief's Mark" and grant stacks of "Master Thief Mark". When used, teleport behind the target with the most stacks
details: Both "Phantom Thief's Mark" and "Master Thief Mark" accumulate up to 7 stacks<bp_The attack will target the enemy with the most "Phantom Thief's Mark"_Upon reaching 7 stacks of "Master Thief Mark" and no enemies are marked, the enemy with the highest max HP will be targeted_>
When used, grants invinciblity briefly after teleporting
Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mille-aiguilles.png} tip={Mille Aiguilles (4th Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/tempest.png} tip={Tempest (4th Job)}> must hit an enemy 7 times to gain a stack of "Master Thief Marks"
Immpeccable Memory attacks must hit an enemy 5 times to gain a stack of "Master Thief Marks"

fifthMain.name: Rift Break
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 990%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Chase Cut or Teleport: 7\nCooldown: 30 sec, cooldown is reduced by 3.5 sec per remaining teleports
fifthMain.desc: Upon pressing the Skill Key, teleport up to 7 times to enemies, damaging surrounding enemies at that location
details: Pressing the Skill Key will end the attack early and reduce the cooldown based on how many teleports remain
The teleport location can be directed by using the Arrow Keys<bp_Pressing the Down Arrow Key will teleport you to the furthest enemy in range_>

fifthBoost.shortDesc: Carte Blanc and Carte Noir Final Damage: +120%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/tempest.png} tip={Tempest (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Tempest
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 25, Can hold key down for up to 3 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 850%, Number of Attacks: 4\nEnemy DEF Ignored: 20% for 60\nCooldown: 18 sec

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/phantom/mille-aiguilles.png} tip={Mille Aiguilles (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Mille Aiguilles
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost per Attack: 17, Damage: 485%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Hits: 3
While pressing the skill key, use the directional keys to move.
------HEXA Mille Aiguilles: Fortune------
MP Cost: 75, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 670%, Number of Attacks: 6

masteryCore.name: Fate Shuffle
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Decides HEXA Mille Aiguille's fate\nCooldown: 3 sec
details: Choose between HEXA Mille Aiguilles and HEXA Mille Aiguilles: Fortune

originSkill.name: Defying Fate
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Refuses fate, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 780%, Number of Attacks: 15, Number of Chase Cuts: 57
Hero's Will Duration: 30 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 640%, Number of Attacks: 15
Cooldown: 360 sec

boostCore.name: Luck of the Draw Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Luck of the Draw Final Damage: +60%

boostCore.name: Ace in the Hole Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Ace in the Hole Final Damage: +60%

meta: Phantom is LUK thief class part of the Heroes class group. What makes Phantoms unique is their ability to steal and use the Skills Explorer classes except for Zen
